hero.title: The Vibe-First MCP Platform
hero.subtitle: Configure Once, Connect Everywhere. Transform MCP service deployment from complex to simple, from local to cloud. Unleash the infinite power of AI connections like the Infinity Stones.

freeServers.title: Free MCP Servers
freeServers.subtitle: Try these free public MCP servers to experience the power of Model Context Protocol. Perfect for development, testing, and learning.

atlassian.title: Atlassian MCP Server
atlassian.description: Connect to Jira, Confluence, and other Atlassian services with full API access

github.title: GitHub MCP Server
github.description: Access GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, and collaboration features

aws.title: AWS MCP Server
aws.description: Manage AWS resources and services through MCP protocol

howToConnect.title: How to Connect
howToConnect.subtitle: Getting started with free MCP servers is simple. Follow these steps to connect and start using them.

step1.title: Choose a Server
step1.description: Browse our curated list of public MCP servers and pick one that fits your needs.

step2.title: Copy Connection URL
step2.description: Each server provides a connection URL. Simply copy it to your clipboard.

step3.title: Connect & Use
step3.description: Add the URL to your Claude configuration and start interacting with the service.
